linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04.4 LTS
  • Processor: AMD 5 2500/Intel i5-7200
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R9 280
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: OS must support Vulkan and X11 (or XWayland).
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Arch Linux
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 2700X/Intel i7-8700K
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: OS must support Vulkan and X11 (or XWayland).

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS Catalina 10.15.4
  • Processor: Intel i9 2.4 GHz, intel only.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 5500
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Processor: 3.6 GHZ Quad Core Intel i5, intel only.
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 5500
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
